Description: The Saudi Investment Bank (known as: Saib) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Saib operates within the Banks sector focusing on Diversified Banks. It has companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Saib is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1976.
